name: MLK COMMUNITY HEALTHCARE
govEntities: Centers For Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS)
sampleDescriptions: Provide guidance and advocacy with regard to federal regulations and legislation that could impact non-profit health care providers generally, or MLK Community Healthcare specifically.
